attributes.action: allow Samar to stay in Great Britain indefinitely to safeguard her life.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Iranian Christian Samar is under threat of being deported back to Iran despite the existance of a death warrant, issued on May 21 by the Islamic Revolutionary Court, stating that anyone who "backslides" (from Islam) deserves to be stoned to death.
Although the Home Secretary has granted an eleventh hour reprieve, the outcome is by no means certain. Your petition would be greatly appreciated.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
